about_the_game:
In this demo version, you can play the first part of “Hanaby's Summer Festival”.

The following are the differences from the full version:
  • You can play World 1 and 2 in the demo version.
  • The capacity of Rains (in-game currency) is limited 9,999 (it is raised to 9,999,999 in the full version).

Saved data can be transferred


You can save your progress in the same way as the full version.
Since The demo version and the full version share the same saved data, you can play the full version from the continuation of the trial version.

content_descriptors.notes:
Huge vibrators appear as obstacles.
Please just avoid them.

detailed_description:
In this demo version, you can play the first part of “Hanaby's Summer Festival”.

The following are the differences from the full version:
  • You can play World 1 and 2 in the demo version.
  • The capacity of Rains (in-game currency) is limited 9,999 (it is raised to 9,999,999 in the full version).

Saved data can be transferred


You can save your progress in the same way as the full version.
Since The demo version and the full version share the same saved data, you can play the full version from the continuation of the trial version.

fullgame.name: 夏まつりのハナビィ Hanaby's Summer Festival

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 or later
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Hanaby's Summer Festival Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or later
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
